pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h1",null,{"id":"使用方法","children":"使用方法"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/make.conf"}]," 中添加以下内容（如果文件不存在，则新建该文件）："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"MASTER_SITE_OVERRIDE?={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/distfiles/${DIST_SUBDIR}/"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["ports.tar.gz 文件为 Ports Collection，可以下载后解压到 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/usr/ports/"}]," 目录。
也可参考 FreeBSD Handbook 中 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Installing the Ports Collection"}]," 一节，使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"git"}]," 获取 ports tree："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git clone {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ports.git /usr/ports"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"注："}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["部分 ports 的源代码需要从 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"http://distcache.freebsd.org/ports-distfiles/","rel":"nofollow","children":"http://distcache.freebsd.org/ports-distfiles/"}]," 以外的 master site 下载，本镜像未包含这些文件。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["本镜像仅包含 ports tree 中 HEAD branch 引用到的文件。季度分支（如 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"2024Q4"}],"）引用的文件有可能不包含在本镜像中。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"FreeBSD 基本系统并未预置 git，需要自行安装 Port devel/git。"}],"
"]}]]}]

meta.title: FreeBSD ports 镜像使用帮助
